thread.title: CBB hunk Jamie O'Hara pulls back from Bianca Gascoigne romance because of ex-wife Danielle Lloyd
thread.title_full: CBB hunk Jamie O'Hara pulls back from Bianca Gascoigne romance because of ex-wife Danielle Lloyd

author: Nicola Agius
title: CBB hunk Jamie O'Hara pulls back from Bianca Gascoigne romance because of ex-wife Danielle Lloyd
text:
Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Celebrity Big Brother fans have high hopes for Jamie O'Hara and Bianca Gascoigne. 
The two have been inseparable in the house and have both confessed they are starting to fall for each other. 
However, in tonight's episode of the Channel 5 reality show, he puts the breaks on. 
During a heart-to-heart with the stunning blonde, he tells her that although she is an "amazing girl", the situation with ex-wife Danielle Lloyd and their three sons is making him "hold back". Celebrity Big Brother fans have high hopes for Jamie O'Hara and Bianca Gascoigne (Photo: Channel 5) 
"You wouldn’t want to deal with my s**t,” he explains. Read More 
Despite being disappointed, Bianca is understanding and tells him: "I get it." Jamie has appeared to put the breaks on the romance (Photo: Channel 5) 
Jamie and Danielle were together for five years but split after he was exposed in the papers for cheating. 
They now have a court order in place to not speak about each other in public. Jamie and Danielle Lloyd were together for five years (Photo: Getty) 
"He obviously regrets what he’s done in the past but now blames me for not wanting to stay in the relationship," Danielle revealed on This Morning last week. 
Channel 5 bosses reportedly asked the model to go into the CBB house to confront her ex about the comments he's made about her on the show. 
However, she categorically denied this. Danielle believes Jamie regrets cheating on her (Photo: Roland Leon/Sunday Mirror) 
She explained: "I don’t want to leave my kids and it would just be for entertainment. 
"It wouldn't’t be fun for me or the kids." 
*Celebrity Big Brother is on Channel 5 tonight at 9pm Like us on Facebook
